Uses of ITask in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task
 

Classes in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task that implement ITask
 class RealTimeTask
          RealTimeTask implements IRealTimeTask to provide the most basic implementation for time dependent tasks.
 class Task
          Task defines the most basic abstraction of all types of tasks.
 

Uses of ITask in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.state
 

Classes in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.state that implement ITask
 class GameStateTask
          GameStateTask extends RealTimeTask to change the current active GameState.
 

Uses of ITask in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.state.battle
 

Classes in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.state.battle that implement ITask
 class AddMOBTask
          AddMOBTask extends RealTimeTask to create and add a MOB to the BattleState.
 class AttachTask
          AttachTask extends RealTimeTask to define the task that grabs a flag.
 class AttackTask
          AttackTask extends RealTimeTask to define the task that initiates the attacking process.
 class ChatTask
          ChatTask extends RealTimeTask to define the task that processes a chat message
 class CorrectionTask
          CorrectionTask extends RealTimeTask to correct the position of a character.
 class CreateSnowballTask
          CreateSnowballTask extends Task to define the task that generates a throwing snow ball action.
 class MoveCharacterTask
          MoveCharacterTask extends RealTimeTask to set the destination of the user controlled CharacterEntity.
 class MoveSnowballTask
          MoveSnowballTask extends RealTimeTask to initiate the throw motion of a snow ball.
 class RemoveMOBTask
          RemoveMOBTask extends RealTimeTask to define the task that removes an entity.
 class RespawnTask
          RespawnTask extends RealTimeTask to respawn a dead character.
 class ScoreTask
          ScoreTask extends RealTimeTask to score a win for the character.
 class StartGameTask
          StartGameTask extends RealTimeTask to start the actual snow ball battle.
 class UpdateCursorStateTask
          UpdateStateTask extends RealTimeTask to update all the corresponding values associated with mouse position.
 

Uses of ITask in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.state.login
 

Classes in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.state.login that implement ITask
 class AuthenticateTask
          AuthenticateTask extends RealTimeTask to login the user into the server application.
 class LoginSuccessTask
          LoginSuccessTask extends RealTimeTask to notify the user that the login has succeeded
 class ReadyTask
          ReadyTask extends RealTimeTask to define the task that sends out a ready packet back to the server.
 class ResetLoginTask
          ResetLoginTask extends RealTimeTask to reset the login scene after an attempt to login failed.
 

Uses of ITask in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.util
 

Methods in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.util that return ITask
 ITask TaskManager.createTask(ETask enumn, Object... args)
          Create a task with given type and submit it to the task execution queue.
 

Methods in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.util with parameters of type ITask
 boolean TaskManager.submit(ITask task)
          Submit the given task to the TaskManager for later execution.
 

Uses of ITask in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.interfaces
 

Subinterfaces of ITask in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.interfaces
 interface IRealTimeTask
          IRealTimeTask defines the interface for time dependent tasks.
